pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:5.1: 38. The training rule on outside their own country
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:6.2: At that time the nuns went wandering without a group of travelers where it was considered dangerous and frightening outside their own country.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.3: “How can nuns go wandering without a group of travelers where it is considered dangerous and frightening outside their own country?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.7: How can nuns go wandering without a group of travelers where it was considered dangerous and frightening outside their own country?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:8.1: ‘If a nun goes wandering without a group of travelers where it is considered dangerous and frightening outside her own country, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:10.2: in any country apart from the one where she is living.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:11.2: a place where criminals are camped, eating, standing, sitting, or lying down has been seen along that road.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:12.2: thieves have been seen along that road, injuring, robbing, or beating people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:13.2: not with a group of travelers.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:14.2: when the villages are a chicken’s flight apart, then for every village interval she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:14.3: If it is in an uninhabited area, in the wilderness, then for every six kilometers she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:15.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:16.1: The eighth training rule is finished.
